instructions: ➨ means: circle NO in the diagnostic box and move to the next module
If fewer than 2 E1 situations = YES → END_MODULE
If 2 or more of the situations in E1 = YES → proceed to E2 → E3 → E4 → E5 → E6
If any of E2–E5 = NO → END_MODULE

questions.prompt: Do you feel anxious or uneasy in places or situations where help might not be available or escape difficult if you had a panic-like or embarrassing symptom, such as being in a crowd or queue, in an open space or crossing a bridge, in an enclosed space, when alone away from home, when alone at home, or traveling in a bus, train, car, or using public transportation?
Do these situations almost always bring on fear or anxiety?
Do you fear these situations so much that you avoid them, suffer through them, or need a companion to face them?
Is this fear or anxiety excessive or out of proportion to the real danger in the situation?
Did this avoidance, fear or anxiety persist for at least 6 months?
Did these symptoms cause significant distress or problems at home, at work, at school or in some other important way?
